snippet: The attack, which killed at least four civilians, prompted a sharp rebuke from President Hamid Karzai, who has long bristled at the deaths of Afghans in foreign-led military operations.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and AHMAD SHAKIB

lead_paragraph: The attack, which killed at least four civilians, prompted a sharp rebuke from President Hamid Karzai, who has long bristled at the deaths of Afghans in foreign-led military operations.

headline.main: Afghan Civilians Killed in Airstrike by American-Led Coalition
headline.print_headline: Afghan Civilians Killed in Airstrike by American-Led Coalition

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
